title: How RapidAI Uses Edge, Kubernetes and AI to Boost Stroke Care
author: Charles Humble
description: While LLMs and generative AI are getting the bulk of big tech hype, healthcare powered by edge-to-cloud architecture is where AI really counts.
cntitle: RapidAI 如何利用边缘、Kubernetes 和 AI 提升中风护理
cndescription: 虽然 LLM 和生成式 AI 占据了大部分科技巨头的炒作，但由边缘到云架构支持的医疗保健才是 AI 真正发挥作用的地方。
